long_description: The skinny-jeans-inspired women's Lole Salutation leggings go to any length to offer the perfect fit for yoga: Three lengths of pre-finished hems make them easy to cut to the length you want. A supportive blend of organic cotton, lyocell and elastane offers 4-way stretch, moisture wicking and odor resistance. Medium rise; ruching at knees; flat seams for comfort; 2 front pockets with satin binding; reflective logo. The women's Lole Salutation leggings offer a shaped, next-to-body fit.
short_description: The skinny-jeans-inspired women's Lole Salutation leggings go to any length to offer the perfect fit for yoga: Three lengths of pre-finished hems make them easy to cut to the length you want.
